subscription.title: Subscription Purchase
sentToEmail: subscriptions are sent directly to your email, please check for an email sent by
to get your product and/or get in touch with the business.
subscription.note: If you need help, please refer to the merchant's contact page using the button below. You can also access our customer billing portal to manage the active subscriptions in your name.
subscription.return: You can now return to the merchant's website, where the subscription will be active soon. If you need help, please refer to the merchant's contact page using the button below. You can also access our customer billing portal to manage the active subscriptions in your name.

subscription.description: You are purchasing the {{- subscriptionName }} subscription. Once the invoice is flagged as completed you will automatically receive the months you have paid for.

messageCashApp: The shop must now accept your
Once this action has been processed, you will automatically receive an email with the product you bought.
This action may require a few hours, you can close this page.
message: Once it reaches the required confirmations, the product you bought will be shipped to your email.

canceled.message: The invoice has been voided, this means that your payments may not went as expected or that you reached the time limit.
canceled.messageRefunded: The transaction has been refunded, you have received your money back and the invoice has been canceled.
canceled.messageReversed: PayPal has reversed this transaction, you have received your money back and the invoice has been canceled.

dispute.message: This invoice is currently under a dispute from the customer.

message: {{name}} has been received but it’s not enough.
, please send the remaining amount in order to fulfill the invoice

stripe.message: {{paymentName}} payments take 2 to 14 days for the transaction to be processed and completed, depending on your bank. Once you have sent the payment, please wait for the invoice to be marked as paid.

chrome.title: Google Pay not showing up?
chrome.message: If Google Pay does not appear on the payment form, please check that you are on the latest version of Chrome. Google Pay is shown only when you are logged in to Google and your Google account has a wallet with at least one linked credit card.

other.title: Apple Pay not showing up?
other.message: If Apple Pay does not appear on the payment form, please check that you are on the latest version of Safari. Apple Pay is shown only if your iCloud wallet has at least one linked credit card.

alreadyPaid.title: Already Paid?
alreadyPaid.message: If you have already sent a payment with Stripe, the order may take up to 60 seconds to be processed.

somethingWrong.title: Something went wrong
message: If something went wrong while trying to purchase, please do not hesitate to

product.onHold: Questo prodotto è trattenuto e non può essere comprato ora

subscription.onHold: Questo prodotto è in attesa e non può essere comprato al momento.

product.developerInvoiceDescription:
You are purchasing a service by {{productTitle}}.
Once your payment is completed and this invoice flagged as paid, you will be redirected back to {{productTitle}}'s site.
If you have any issue, please refer directly to {{productTitle}}'s support.

discountTitle: by adding one more products to your cart with our discounts.

terms.noTerms: Lo shop {{- shopName}} non ha termini e condizioni.

trust.title: Trusted Advisor

identityText.yes: This business has verified its identity and details to Sellix. Verified businesses have gone through an address and document validation phase which confirms their identity and the uniqueness of the merchant.
identityText.no: This business has not verified its identity and details to Sellix. We cannot confirm this store is a valid and unique merchant.

trust.salesText: This metric takes into consideration the quantity of sales this business had in the last 14 days. High and Medium sales mean that the business has been proactively selling goods with at least one order daily.
trust.feedbackText: The feedback appeal ratio takes into consideration the total amount of feedback a merchant has and how many have been appealed (either removed or contested). The appeal ratio has a value between 0.00 and 1, where 0.10 corresponds to 10% of all feedback appealed.
trust.feedbackScoreText: The feedback score helps customers understand whether or not this business has had positive feedback recently, meaning that every customer purchased a valid good.

paypalAccepted.no: PayPal or Credit/Debit cards not accepted

paypalText: This merchant does not accept any payment method with consumer protection. For example, Cryptocurrencies and Cash App cannot accept refunds due to their nature. Proceed with caution and be sure that you know what you're buying.

This merchant accepts payment methods, such as PayPal and Credit/Debit Cards, with consumer protection; meaning that a refund request can be executed when paying through them only if the purchased good is not valid. However, this does not mean that refund requests are available for payment methods like Cash App and Cryptocurrencies as they are not accepted due to their nature.
trust.help: What is Trusted Advisor and what does this mean for customers?

toastify.fail: An error happened while trying to access one of your resources.
